text: Kare koso wa, ame o ten kara furasu katadearu. Ware wa kore o motte subete no mono (shokubutsu) no me o moe dasa se, tsugini shinryoku (no gun ha) o dasa se, ruirui to kokumotsu o minora seru. Mata natsumeyashi no saya kara,(omoku) taresagatta bō (o hae dasa se), mata budō, orību, zakuro-tō, dōrui ishu no kaju (o sodateru). Sono kajitsu ga musubi, soshite seijuku suru no o kansatsu shi nasai. Sono nakaniha hontōni shinkō suru hitobito e no shirushi ga aru
